game.suite

Class ChessPawn

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.suite.ChessPiece
      • game.suite.ChessPawn

  • public class ChessPawn
extends ChessPiece
    Subclass of a Piece specific to a Pawn. This handles all movements the pawn is capable of making.
